items.title: Markets to track global cues, trading activity in holiday-shortened week
items.description: On the domestic front, upcoming monthly auto sales data and quarterly updates from companies could drive stock-specific movements

items.title: Mcap of 8 most valued firms surges Rs 1.21 trn; Reliance biggest winner
items.description: The market valuation of Reliance Industries jumped Rs 53,652.92 crore to Rs 20,65,197.60 crore
